Most of the women or mainly middle-class women have a great asset that is to make delicious healthy food.It is popularly said, Mothers have a taste in their hands.Home cooked food with a motherly feeling always tastes better than outside food. Moms cook food every day for their family and are the master chefs of delicious food. So the homemade food delivery app gives the joy of eating home cooked food to people,students, working professionals who are living outside of their home and constantly miss home cooked food.And this will also help women at home to earn and feel proud of themselves. One doesn\'t need to get into corporate to business,a mom\’s kitchen can become her office as well.

Our Home Chefs come from all Parts of the country to create a Food Culture of Diversity and uniting everyone with Food. They have been delighting their family,friends and loved ones over decades. Most of these Chefs have carried forward hidden recipes passed to them by their Mother and Grandmother that have been applauded by everyone over the ages.

1.Affordable and Value for Money Breakfast, Lunch, Snacks, Dinner, Cakes, Sweets 2.100% Safe Food: Healthy, Tasty, Fresh and Hygienic food For COVID Patients. 3. Cash on Delivery available for all food order 4. Customize Online Food delivery and cake order delivery as per your taste and preferences. 5. Directly speak to Home Chefs for taste preferences.100% Refund,0% cancellation charges. 6. Advance Orders, Future Orders, Party Orders, Tiffin services and Food Catering.

The booming food-on-demand industry is opening up countless opportunities for entrepreneurs to create their own small businesses. One unique business model is selling homemade food ,and it has never been easier to enter the home based food delivery market with the help of food delivery apps. There is now a growing trend of independent food startups and home-based food businesses utilising food delivery apps to sell their homemade goods.

Every Doctor and all Medical Research only recommend home cooked food 1.Ghar Ka Khana gives you joy of eating. 2. Homely meals are essential for a Balanced Diet and Healthy Body.. 3. Home food builds immunity, prevents diseases and obesity.

HomelyChef is a mobile application made by Abdullah Barudgar under the supervision of Dr.Farheen Siddiqui,Jamia Hamdard University.HomelyChef is reviving the Culture of Home Food by giving everyone a variety of cuisines across home food and Bakery choices. Their Chefs have learned the art of cooking through their unwavering passion and coached by their Mom, Dad, and Granny, who could sprinkle their magic in the food they cook.

Q.1 How HomelyChef help women in society ?
Q.2 Who are your home chefs ?
Q.3 How food delivery app help new entrepreneurs ?
Q.4 Why choose us for online food delivery ?
Q.5 What is the benefit of home made food ?

Meet our Delhi based Home Chef Mr. Huzaif Akhtar.He became a home chef and more than thirty years of cooking experience. He started \"Pind Tadka\" from his residence. It\’s been one year since he also started his YouTube channel \“Cook with huzaif\”. He is an Indian Home Chef,His specialties are mainly traditional Indian cuisine. He used to cook at home where his friends and family members used to appreciate him food and that motivated him always. This motivated him to try something new, some fusion food, traditional food etc. With every success, he started trying new cuisine and new recipe which would bring more accolades to him.

It\’s been one year since he also started his blog \“Cook with firoz\”. He is an Indian Home Chef,His specialties are mainly traditional Indian Burgers. He used to cook at home where his friends and family members used to appreciate him food and that motivated him always. This motivated him to try something new, some fusion food, traditional food etc. With every success, he started trying new cuisine and new recipe which would bring more accolades to him.
